page.title: 19The Foods We Eat
page.content: y name is Mark Slater,I eat all kinds f foods,I like fish and chips best of all and barbecues.My dad likes steak, chips and peas.My mum likes prawns, salad and coleslaw and barbecues.My brother likes beefburgers,chips and eans and he likes sausages. All my family likes Chinese food.Sometimes my mum goes to the fish and chip shop in Eye about two and a half miles away. James Burrows weekly menu.Breakfast for the week is cereal or toast.At school I have a packed lunch of sandwiches,crips and a chocolate biscuit.For tea on Monday-sausages in batter and chips; Tuesday-chicken curry;Wednesday-fish cakes and Alpha bites;Thursday-a beef- burger sandwich;Friday-fishfingers and Chips. We have found that many people have a traditional Christmas dinner of turkey and Christmas pudding but others have ice-cream and drink wine and coke.
